ThingsGateway.Management.RedundancyHoste.SwitchMasterState: Cannot connect to redundant site, local machine will switch to normal state
ThingsGateway.Management.RedundancyHoste.SwitchSlaveState: Master site has recovered, local machine (standby) will switch to standby state
ThingsGateway.Management.RedundancyHoste.SwitchNormalState: Local machine (primary site) will switch to normal state
ThingsGateway.Management.RedundancyHoste.ErrorSynchronizingData: Synchronize data to standby site error

ThingsGateway.Management.RedundancyOptio.IsStartBusinessDevice: Enable Business Device in Slave Site
ThingsGateway.Management.RedundancyOptio.Restart: The redundant service will be restarted soon
